title: The Deep State Is Exposed | Guests: Lara Logan & Cabot Phillips | 5/13/20
description:
Obamagate blows the lid off the Deep State, and tonight on GlennTV, Glenn will dive into the documents that prove Obama himself was the chief architect. What is “unmasking,” and why is it such a big deal? Dr. Fauci testified before the Senate, and while Sen. Rand Paul says he’s not the “end-all” voice on the coronavirus, many on the Left still take his word as gospel. The American people lead the government, not the other way around. Award-winning investigative journalist Lara Logan joins to break down Obamagate and the FBI’s abuse of power in the Michael Flynn case. Campus Reform’s Cabot Phillips joins to expose how China is infiltrating our universities. The MLB and theaters may open up soon, but when will audiences return? 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
